# hooks

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

> A module with hooks

This is a superb module!

## Installation

Install `hooks` using [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/):

```bash
npm install --save hooks
```

## Usage

### Module usage

```javascript
const hooks = require('hooks');

// ...
```

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| a | `Mixed` | ... |
| b | `Mixed` | ... |

...
